main.aboutusdesc: General Chitoro ndiyo nzvimbo yezvitoro yezvose zvitoro zveGeneral Store zvakapoterera pasirese zviri kuita vaparadzi vezvigadzirwa zvinozivikanwa.
main.subscribedesc: Ndapota nyora email yako kana iwe uchida kugamuchira nhau dzichangoburwa kubva kwatiri.

title: Ipa Kure %s
subtitle: Nyoresa izvozvi kuti uwane mukana wekuhwina %s!

section1.sDesc1: Pano chete ndipo paunogona kuwana vazhinji vachipa mabhenefiti, nyore kujoina, akanakisa ekupa zvigadzirwa uye zvimwe zvakasiyana mabhenefiti

item.descItem2: Haibhadharise chero mubhadharo kana uchigamuchira kupihwa.
item.descItem3: Wana GetAway mumaawa asingasviki makumi maviri nemana!

banner1.bDesc1: Kana iwe wakanyoresa, tarisa email yako nguva nenguva kuti uwane ruzivo rwechizvino kubva kwatiri. Tichapawo mavocha ekuti titenge kuchitoro chedu mahara. Wakamirira chii! <a href='%s' target='_blank'> Kutanga !!

section2.sDesc2: Sarudza chipo chaunoda, iwe unogona zvakare kutora chikamu mune ese akapihwa kubva pane iyo runyorwa yatinopa pazasi.

banner2.bDesc2: Chete nekuzvinyoresa pachako iwe unogona kutora chikamu mune yedu yekupa. Wakamirira chii! ngatimbo Nyoresa pachako izvozvi

section3.sDesc3: Wana mahara GiveAway mumaawa asingasviki makumi maviri nemana! Usapotsa uyu mukana usingawanzoitika, zviri nyore kwazvo, ingo nyora pawebhusaiti yedu uye utore ongororo (kana paine), haufanire kubhadhara chero chinhu. Makorokoto!

step1.ssDesc11: Kuti uwane mukana wekuhwina iyo %s, zvese zvaunoda kuti uite kuzadza fomu rekunyoresa account yako. Kuti utange, ingo pinda mumakwikwi neemail kero.

step2.ssDesc21: Paunenge iwe watopinda, iwe uchave nemukana wekuwana zvimwe zvinyorwa nekuzadza zviito zvakasiyana, zvinosanganisira kushanyira edu enhau media chiteshi.
step2.ssDesc22: Iwe une kodzero yekupedzisa zviito zvakawanda sezvaunoda, chiito chega chega chinopa nhamba yakasarudzika yezvinyorwa uye chega chega chekupinda chingave chinokunda.
step2.ssDesc23: Iwe unogona zvakare kutsika zviito zve $ 1 chete.

step3.ssDesc31: Zvaitwa. Isu tinobva tangobatana newe zvichibva pakubata kwaive kwakazadzwa panguva yekunyora panzvimbo yedu.

banner3.bDesc3: Ichi chiitiko chinopa akawanda ekukunda slots kupfuura gore rapfuura. Koka shamwari dzako uye mhuri kune akatowanda mikana. Nyoresa izvozvi chiitiko ichi chisati chatanga.

theWinner.coment1: Ndatenda neCash, ndinovimba chitoro chenyu chichava chakazara.
theWinner.coment2: Ichi chaicho chiri chakakurumbira chitoro cheGeneralStore, pasuru yacho yakabudirira ini yandakatambira, Chigadzirwa ndechekutanga, uye ini handina kubhadhara chero fizi. Ndatenda.
theWinner.coment3: Pakutanga handina kuzvitenda, asi mushure mekunge ndataura navo zvakazoonekwa kuti yaive GeneralStore. ndinokutendai GeneralStore ye %s.
theWinner.coment4: Ndatenda mwari nekuwedzera rombo rangu, maita basa nekupa, GeneralStore ndinoida.

section5.sDesc5: Kutenda kwedu nerutsigiro ruzere runotibatsira nguva dzose
section5.dSupport1: American multinational technology kambani inogara muSeattle, Washington, iyo inotarisana ne e-commerce, gore komputa, kutenderera kwedhijitari, uye kungwara kwekunyepedzera.
section5.dSupport2: American internet mutengesi anotengesa zvakanyanya fanicha inowanikwa kuMidvale, Utah, padyo neSalt Lake City. Patrick M. Byrne akatanga Overstock.com muna 1999.
section5.dSupport3: American multinational retail corporation inoshanda keteni yehypermarket, zvitoro zvemadhora, uye zvitoro kubva kuUnited States, dzimbahwe riri muBentonville, Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: American multinational vatengi vemagetsi mutengesi ane mahofisi makuru muRichfield, Minnesota. Iyo pakutanga yakavambwa naRichard M. Schulze naJames Wheeler mu1966 seyeti yekuteerera yakasarudzika inonzi Izwi reMimhanzi.
section5.dSupport5: Yepamhepo yekutengesa sevhisi yakavakirwa muChina inowanikwa neAlibaba Group Yakatangwa mu2010, inoumbwa nemabhizinesi madiki muChina nedzimwe nzvimbo, senge Singapore, dzinopa zvigadzirwa kune vatengi vepasirose online.
section5.dSupport6: American multinational e-commerce mubatanidzwa iri muSan Jose, California, iyo inobatsira vatengi-kune-vatengi uye bhizinesi-kune-vatengi kutengesa kuburikidza newebhusaiti.

section6.sDesc6: Kana iwe uine chero mibvunzo nezve chigadzirwa, kana chero ruzivo iwe rwaunoda, ndapota usazeze kutibata nesu.
section6.subject: Musoro
